resources.string: This application complies with the General Data Protection Regulation..

For its proper functioning, we need to access and / or store some of your personal data. You may at any time request the complete deletion of all data concerning you in the \"Management of personal data\" section of your account.
I have read and accept the Terms of Sales
I have read and accept the Terms of Service
I accept the collection of personal information for commercial prospecting purposes.
I accept the collection of personal information for improvement and statistics purposes.
I accept the storage of my personal data.
I accept the storage of my banking data.
You can delete your account at any time. All data stored on our servers will be deleted.
